Title: Contract for a Stock Management Tool for Somerset County Council on behalf of LibrariesWest (Ref: DN106700)
Description: Somerset County Council are looking to procure a library stock management software system allows the library service (on behalf of the LibrariesWest Consortium and other Local Authority Library Services) to manage library stock effectively in all library sites with minimum staff intervention, using evidence based reports to transfer non issuing stock to new locations, aid de-selection and empower library staff to engage with library stock, therefore covering the legal requirements of the council to provide a comprehensive and efficient library service.
Additional Text:
This is a Contracts Finder Award Notice, therefore there are no instructions to suppliers, the above is for information only.
South West
Supplier [Name|Address|Ref type|Ref Numb: [Bridgeall Libraries Ltd|Hillington Park Innovation Centre, 1 Ainslie Road, Glasgow, Lanarkshire, G52 4RU, UK|||No|No]

Title: Library Stock Management Portal
Description: Library stock management portal software is required to enable the Service to manage stock effectively in all library sites with minimum staff intervention, using evidence based reports to transfer non issuing stock to new locations, aid de-selection and empower library staff to engage with library stock, therefore covering the legal statutory requirements of the council to provide a comprehensive and efficient library service.
Additional Text: For further information and in order to respond to this tender opportunity go to: www.supplyingthesouthwest.org.uk
